name: House
text:
"Witch’s Cauldron" + "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods"
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Witch’s Cauldron" and/or 1 "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods" in your GY; add them to your hand. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can activate 1 "Witch’s Potion" card from your Deck. If this card leaves the field because of an opponent’s card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods" from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use this effect of "House" once per turn.
